usefulItems: shallow bowl or dish, large serving bowl, fine sieve
title: Mexican Quinoa Salad

ingredients.content: 10 g fresh coriander, leaves only, plus 6 sprigs for garnishing

preparations.content: Place quinoa, 20 g oil and stock cube in mixing bowl then fry <b>3 min/120°C//speed 1<b>. Add water and cook <b>22 min/90°C//speed <b>. Drain through a fine sieve then transfer to a shallow bowl to cool.
Place red pepper, orange pepper, black beans, sweetcorn, spring onions and avocado in a serving bowl and set aside.
Place vinegar, 25 g oil, honey, lime juice, coriander, jalapeño chilli, red chilli, mustard, garlic, salt and pepper in mixing bowl, blend <b>15 sec/speed 10<b> then add to serving bowl.
Once quinoa has cooled, add to serving bowl then mix thoroughly. Sprinkle with chopped, fresh coriander leaves then serve.
